title: Star guardian jinx, unavailable?
body: I want to buy {{champion:222}}  new star guardian skin, but its unavaible, anyone know more about this? im so hyped for this skin!

replies.body: New skins, champions, etc. are normally not available for unlock/purchase when a patch arrives but instead become available some time later.
how  long is it gonna take then? a day? weeks?

It really depends! Each patch is a bit different. But, not all content will be released the first day of the new patch. 

When there's a lot of content, we want to make sure each skin/champion etc. has a bit of time in the spotlight. Ivern just came out, so it's not likely they'll be out today. But, they will definitely be out a bit later this patch. ^-^
thank you for the helpful infomation :D, canmt wit till star guardian jinx comes out.

Im pretty sure it will be at the next free champ rotation on tuesday/wednesday. So Ivern got his week and after it will be the Star Guardian week. Stay strong everyone <3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I want to know that too. Cant wait to buy Star Guardian Jinx ;_; {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Champions tend to be on day 1 unless a rework is also in the patch like the Shen rework delayed Jhin for a week or if there is a bug that delays them like Kindred
Give me my Star Guardian Brand.
i just bought the skin and it still says unavailable?

> [{quoted}](name=JPP90,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AgQftz5A,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-07T00:37:33.175+0000)
>
> i just bought the skin and it still says unavailable?

Did you buy just one skin or the Bundle because the bundle does not say unavailable?
Im hyped toooo :D i really wanted this skin for a long time now{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
